testcase.classname: Test End to End Items purchase functionality using credit card
testcase.name: Test Search and Purchase electrnic item and pay using credit card
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters username...................................................passed And User enters password....................................................passed And User clicks on signin button............................................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed And User should get welcome message.........................................passed When User enters data in search box.........................................passed And User clicks on Search button............................................passed Then Search results should be displayed.....................................passed
